name: Steamjunk Racer Nine Thousand
description:
Please maximize the web player for the best experience, if you experience issues with the web version, or any version, let me know in a comment

The ultimate in Steamjunk racing (i.e. not falling out of the sky).

Toggle you wog-toggler to drop your loot hook and start hooking all of that sweet sweet loot. Make sure to direct your ship upwards with the steering wheel and gas up you balloon with the up-gasser nine thousand with whatever burnables you find along the way. Move forward by charging your spring powered propeller. Don't forget the great tunes from you're BOOMER(c) and you're all set for the makings of a good time!

Made with douglass (who did a bunch of the art in addition to a bunch of programming)

All controlling done with the yellow outlined buttons in game

ports coming soon

LD Page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=122601
